name: FTR Roller Skate Wheel Bag / tool bag / various colors
description: More wheel bag color options are available in our ETSY store :>>>>>>> click here to shop our Etsy store. Here is the wheel bag you've been looking for!!! In FTR style our heavy weight fabrics are hand screen printed with our original skate images and patterns then hand sewn into these amazing double zipper wheel bags. Available in a variety of color combos they feature a double zipper with a nifty single pull for easy access and a heavy duty velcro enclosure to keep the bag closed. Our wheel bags are made out of a heavy weight coated canvas fabric that is water resistant. No two bags are totally identical, variations in use of pattern panels and placement occur from bag to bag. Fits narrow and wide wheels (59 &62mm). Measures approximately 7.5" x 5.5" x 5.5. For international shipping, please contact us for shipping rates. COPYRIGHT 2013 Flat Track Revolution *Wheels NOT included.

name: FTR Hip Bag // AVAILABLE ON ETSY >>>>
description: HIP BAGS ARE BACK IN STOCK -- GET HIP BAGS HERE //ON ETSY: >>>>>>> click here to shop for a hip bag! We are listing these on Etsy because each one is an original handmade gem! These handmade bags feature our power skate image layered over FTR patterns. There is a new and improved larger/more industrial belt loop across the back so you can either use the bag with our belt or use your own. They are made out of a coated canvas that is water resistant. No two bags are exactly alike. Measures approximately 8" x 6". We have a bunch of new styles in bright bold color combos. Since each one is a little bit different we are listing them on Etsy so you can choose your individual bag.

name: FTR Handmade bags > AVAILABLE NOW ON ETSY!
description: GET TOTE BAGS HERE //ON ETSY: >>>>>>> click here to shop for FTR bags! Each of our tote bags are hand made originals, these are only a few examples, they are all reversible with 3 pockets inside to store your phone/keys etc. No two totes are exactly alike so you won't see someone else sporting a bag exactly like this. Our totes are gusseted (for extra room at the bottom), lined with a heavy weight fabric and measures approximately 10x12, the perfect size tote bag! You can also wear this proudly knowing it was designed, printed and hand sewn all by derby girls. We are all about the derby! For more of our handmade bags visit our ETSY store: click here for FTR Etsy!

options.name: Birds in the city pocket tote.

name: FTR Hoodie in Vintage Green
description: Find more hoodies in our Etsy store here: CLICK HERE to shop for FTR hoodies! Here it is, our new logo design on this awesome green hoodie. Our logo design is hand screen printed (by us of course) in silver shimmer ink on a vintage green tri-blend American Apparel hoodie, (50% poly, 42%cotton, 8% rayon). The sweatshirt is is ultra-soft, with a heathered look, double-sided with soft French Terry lining and a Cotton/Poly/Rayon Fleece shell. PLEASE NOTE: This item is Unisex sizing only, women may prefer to size down from what you normally wear in womens sizing (see sizing chart). We are currently out of stock in size Medium, check back soon or put in a request and we'll let you know when they are available again. COPYRIGHT 2013 Flat Track Revolution We ship international First Class Mail. This service is not expedited (delivery times vary and per country), and no tracking information is available once the package has left the US. We also offer expedited international shipping, please contact us prior to purchasing for aditional international shipping options available.

name: FTR Hoodie in Tri-Blend Black
description: Find more hoodies in our Etsy store here: CLICK HERE to shop for FTR hoodies! Here it is, our new logo design on this awesome tri-blend black hoodie. Our logo design is hand screen printed (by us of course) in silver shimmer ink on a black (heathered looking) tri-blend American Apparel hoodie. The fabric is made from 50% poly, 42%cotton, 8% rayon. This sweatshirt is is ultra-soft, with a heathered look, double-sided with soft French Terry lining and a Cotton/Poly/Rayon Fleece shell. Unisex sizing only, women may prefer to size down from what you normally wear in womens sizing (see sizing chart). *The sweatshirt in the photo is a size XS, the print will look smaller on larger sweatshirts. Model shown is wearing an AA medium women's T-shirt. The sweatshirt is an XS Unisex chosen for a slimmer fit. Small would also fit this model for a roomier/longer fit. SIZE: Unisex size: XS, S, M, L (this is unisex sizing, women may want to size down, see size chart). Temporarily out of size Medium, check back soon! COPYRIGHT 2013 Flat Track Revolution

name: FTR Sleeveless Hoodie, Silver
description: Find more hoodies in our Etsy store here: CLICK HERE to shop for FTR hoodies! Here it is, our new logo design on this awesome sleeveless hoodie. These are the perfect winter time warmup sweatshirts for derby, wear your long sleeve t-shirt underneath put this on over the top and you are good to go! No messing with pulling your hoodie over your elbow pads. I wear mine pretty much everywhere, we are in love with these. Our logo design is hand screen printed (by us of course) in Silver shimmer ink on a black 100% cotton American Apparel sleeveless hoodie. The sweatshirt is available in Unisex sizing only, for women be sure and size down from what you normally wear in womens sizing. Photo shown is an XS hoodie, the print will appear smaller on larger jackets. COPYRIGHT 2012 Flat Track Revolution FOR SIZE CHART AND OUR ENTIRE SELECTION OF SWEATSHIRTS VISIT OUR ETSY STORE: CLICK HERE!

name: FTR Tri-Blend Tank - Evergreen
description:
This is pretty much the best tank ever. It is hand screen printed (by us) with our FTR winged skate design in metallic silver ink. It has a really nice cut that looks great as a casual every day tank, and can be also be layered over a sports bra for an awesome practice jersey. Not to mention it's great for showing off the guns!

Made from a tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon). Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability; addition of Rayon makes for a unique texture and drapes against the body for a slimming look. It's a lower cut, form fitting Racerback that flares out at the bottom. American Apparel brand tank.

This listing is for our Tri-Blend Evergreen tank
Sizesl: SM, MD & LRG

COPYRIGHT 2013 Flat Track Revolution

name: FTR Winged Skate T - Indigo Blue
description: This t-shirt is soft, rich and gorgeous. It is hand screen printed (by us) with our FTR winged skate design in metallic silver shimmer ink onto a tri-blend indigo t-shirt. Made from a tri-Blend of 50% Polyester , 25% Cotton and 25% Rayon. Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability; addition of Rayon makes for a unique texture and drapes against the body for a slimming look. American Apparel brand T-shirt. Available Women's size: SM, MD, LRG & XL COPYRIGHT 2013 Flat Track Revolution FOR OUR ENTIRE SELECTION of T-shirts & additional products, visit our ETSY STORE: CLICK HERE!

name: Canvas Field Bag, Dark Khaki
description: We have a wider selection of bags on our Etsy store: CLICK HERE to shop for FTR bags! This listing is for the dark khaki/sand field bag printed with our power skate image in black. This bag is simply awesome. With it's roomy main section, this is the perfect everyday bag. It has an interior pocket with hook & loop closure that is the perfect size to hold your phone and keys so they don't get lost down on the bottom of the bag. The bag also has double exterior pockets, one front one back, the back pocket is zippered. Materials: 100% pigment-dyed, garment washed cotton canvas Dimensions: 10"h x 12"w x 3.5"d Customer testimonial: I have this (got it for Christmas) and can not put into words HOW MUCH I LOVE IT!!!! It is soft, so it hangs comfortably, but very well made and holds a good amount of stuff, with out being too big. I LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. Very well made. And super cute and awesome! (Deanna) All images & designs COPYRIGHT 2012 Flat Track Revolution

name: FTR Canvas Field bag, Charcoal
description: We have other bags like this for sale in our Etsy store: CLICK HERE to shop for FTR bags! This listing is for our charcoal field bag printed with our power skate image in black. The charcoal color has a bit of a dark army green undertone to it, being pigment dyed the bag color is super saturated, as the bag wears the background color will fade to a medium charcoal/army.This bag is simply awesome. With it's roomy main section, this is the perfect everyday bag. It has an interior pocket with hook & loop closure that is the perfect size to hold your phone and keys so they don't get lost down on the bottom of the bag. The bag also has double exterior pockets, one front one back, the back pocket is zippered. Materials: 100% pigment-dyed, garment washed cotton canvas Dimensions: 10"h x 12"w x 3.5"d For our entire selection of bags visit our ETSY store: click here for FTR Etsy! Customer testimonial: I have this (got it for Christmas) and can not put into words HOW MUCH I LOVE IT!!!! It is soft, so it hangs comfortably, but very well made and holds a good amount of stuff, with out being too big. I LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. Very well made. And super cute and awesome! (Deanna) All images & designs COPYRIGHT 2012 Flat Track Revolution

name: FTR Leisure Dress, Black
description: To see our full selection of dresses visit our Etsy store. CLICK HERE to shop for more FTR dresses! Support the revolution! Stomp on oppressors. You need this. This dress looks great on, I wear mine to with a pair of boots for work and with skates for derby! 100% cotton. Skate designed and screen printed all by Derby girls (Ringer & Slaybia)! This black dress printed with a silver power skate is available in womens sizes as follows: Sizes: SM, MD, LG & XL See size chart in photos to the right. Fits maybe just slightly looser than your standard modern women's t-shirts. COPYRIGHT 2013 Flat Track Revolution FOR MORE DRESSES VISIT OUR ETSY STORE: click here

It's made by American Apparel and it fits pretty close to how their t-shirts would fit you, although a bit more loose fitting/less form fitting than your average AA shirt. Right now it's available in Red COPYRIGHT 2012 Flat Track Revolution FOR MORE DRESSES, AND SIZE CHART VISIT OUR ETSY STORE: click here Size chart: click here

name: FTR / Hellarad Hip bag!
description: SOLD OUT. ------ This limited edition gold metallic hip bag looks amazing, AND for every bag purchased we donate 5 bucks straight up to Hellarad. This handmade hip bag, (entirely hand made & screen printed by women of derby), is printed in GOLD metallic ink w/ a signature Hellarad mustache. There is a large belt loop across the back. They are made out of a coated canvas that is water resistant. Measures approximately 8" x 6". Comes with removable black nylon belt.
